text: Terrence Horace Evans (June 20, 1934 â€“ August 7, 2015) was American actor, voice artist, and comedian, best known for his role as Baltrim in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine and Star Trek: Voyager. He also portrayed Old Monty in The Texas Chainsaw Massacre and Massacre: The Beginning. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Terrence Evans (Aveleyman) Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania Category:Comedians from Pennsylvania
